20101223112437.000|20101223112441.000|CC1|>> AT THE YEAR AND WHITE HOUSE  
20101223112441.000|20101223112443.000|CC1|NEWS CONFERENCE YESTERDAY,      
20101223112443.000|20101223112445.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA SAID HIS BIGGEST
20101223112445.000|20101223112446.000|CC1|DISAPPOINTMENT OF THE LAME-DUCK 
20101223112446.000|20101223112448.000|CC1|SESSION WAS THE FAILURE TO PASS 
20101223112448.000|20101223112450.000|CC1|THE DREAM ACT THE IMMIGRATION   
20101223112450.000|20101223112451.000|CC1|BILL.                           
20101223112451.000|20101223112453.000|CC1|HE SAID CONGRESS HAD NOT PASSED 
20101223112453.000|20101223112455.000|CC1|THE TAX CUTS AND UNEMPLOYMENT   
20101223112455.000|20101223112456.000|CC1|BILL, THE U.S. ECONOMY WOULD    
20101223112456.000|20101223112458.000|CC1|PROBABLY HAVE BEGUN TO CONTRACT 
20101223112458.000|20101223112459.000|CC1|NEXT YEAR.                      
20101223112459.000|20101223112501.000|CC1|THIS NEWS CONFERENCE CAME BEFORE
20101223112501.000|20101223112503.000|CC1|CONGRESS ADJOURNED FOR THE YEAR.
20101223112503.000|20101223112519.000|CC1|THIS IS 35 MINUTES.             
20101223112519.000|20101223112521.000|CC1|>> I KNOW EVERYBODY IS ITCHING  
20101223112521.000|20101223112522.000|CC1|TO GET OUT OF HERE FOR THE      
20101223112522.000|20101223112524.000|CC1|HOLIDAYS.                       
20101223112524.000|20101223112525.000|CC1|I WANT TO SAY A FEW WORDS ABOUT 
20101223112525.000|20101223112527.000|CC1|THE PROGRESS WE HAVE MADE ON    
20101223112527.000|20101223112529.000|CC1|SOME IMPORTANT ISSUES OVER THESE
20101223112529.000|20101223112530.000|CC1|LAST FEW WEEKS.                 
20101223112530.000|20101223112532.000|CC1|A LOT OF FOLKS IN THIS TOWN     
20101223112532.000|20101223112534.000|CC1|PREDICTED THAT AFTER THE MIDTERM
20101223112534.000|20101223112537.000|CC1|ELECTIONS WASHINGTON WOULD BE   
20101223112537.000|20101223112539.000|CC1|HEADED FOR MORE PARTISANSHIP AND
20101223112539.000|20101223112541.000|CC1|MORE GRIDLOCK.                  
20101223112541.000|20101223112543.000|CC1|INSTEAD, THIS HAS BEEN A SEASON 
20101223112543.000|20101223112544.000|CC1|OF PROGRESS FOR THE AMERICAN    
20101223112544.000|20101223112546.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20101223112546.000|20101223112548.000|CC1|THAT PROGRESS IS REFLECTED -- IS
20101223112548.000|20101223112551.000|CC1|A REFLECTION OF THE MESSAGE THE 
20101223112551.000|20101223112553.000|CC1|VOTERS SENT IN NOVEMBER, A      
20101223112553.000|20101223112555.000|CC1|MESSAGE THAT SAID IT IS TIME TO 
20101223112555.000|20101223112556.000|CC1|FIND COMMON GROUND ON CHALLENGES
20101223112556.000|20101223112558.000|CC1|FACING OUR COUNTRY.             
20101223112558.000|20101223112559.000|CC1|THAT IS A MESSAGE THAT I WILL   
20101223112559.000|20101223112602.000|CC1|TAKE TO HEART IN THE NEW YEAR.  
20101223112602.000|20101223112604.000|CC1|I HOPE MIGHT DEMOCRATIC AND     
20101223112604.000|20101223112605.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN FRIENDS WILL DO THE  
20101223112605.000|20101223112609.000|CC1|SAME PERIOD FIRST OF ALL, I AM  
20101223112609.000|20101223112611.000|CC1|GLAD THE DEMOCRATS AND          
20101223112611.000|20101223112613.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS CAME TOGETHER TO    
20101223112613.000|20101223112614.000|CC1|APPROVE THE TOP NATIONAL        
20101223112614.000|20101223112617.000|CC1|SECURITY PROGRAM, THE NEW START 
20101223112617.000|20101223112617.000|CC1|TREATY.                         
20101223112617.000|20101223112619.000|CC1|THIS IS THE MOST SIGNIFICANT    
20101223112619.000|20101223112620.000|CC1|ARMS CONTROL AGREEMENT IN NEARLY
20101223112620.000|20101223112623.000|CC1|TWO DECADES AND WILL MAKE US    
20101223112623.000|20101223112625.000|CC1|SAFER AND REDUCE OUR NUCLEAR    
20101223112625.000|20101223112626.000|CC1|ARSENAL ALONG WITH RUSSIA.      
20101223112626.000|20101223112628.000|CC1|WITH THIS TREATY, OUR INSPECTORS
20101223112628.000|20101223112632.000|CC1|WILL ALSO BE BACK ON THE GROUND 
20101223112632.000|20101223112633.000|CC1|AT RUSSIAN NUCLEAR BASES.       
20101223112633.000|20101223112636.000|CC1|WE WILL BE ABLE TO TRUST AND    
20101223112636.000|20101223112637.000|CC1|VERIFY.                         
20101223112637.000|20101223112640.000|CC1|WE WILL CONTINUE TO ADVANCE AND 
20101223112640.000|20101223112644.000|CC1|OUR RELATIONSHIP WITH RUSSIA.   
20101223112644.000|20101223112645.000|CC1|WE WILL ENFORCE STRONG SANCTIONS
20101223112645.000|20101223112648.000|CC1|ON IRAQ AND PREVENT NUCLEAR     
20101223112648.000|20101223112649.000|CC1|WEAPONS FROM FALLING INTO THE   
20101223112649.000|20101223112650.000|CC1|HANDS OF TERRORISTS.            
20101223112650.000|20101223112651.000|CC1|THIS TREATY WILL ENHANCE OUR    
20101223112651.000|20101223112653.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP TO STOP THE SPREAD OF
20101223112653.000|20101223112655.000|CC1|NUCLEAR WEAPONS AND SEEK A PIECE
20101223112655.000|20101223112658.000|CC1|OF A WORLD WITHOUT THEM.        
20101223112658.000|20101223112700.000|CC1|A STRONG BIPARTISAN VOTE IN THE 
20101223112700.000|20101223112701.000|CC1|SENATE SENDS A POWERFUL SIGNAL  
20101223112701.000|20101223112703.000|CC1|TO THE WORLD THAT REPUBLICANS   
20101223112703.000|20101223112704.000|CC1|AND DEMOCRATS STAND TOGETHER ON 
20101223112704.000|20101223112706.000|CC1|BEHALF OF OUR SECURITY.         
20101223112706.000|20101223112708.000|CC1|I ESPECIALLY WANT TO THANK THE  
20101223112708.000|20101223112709.000|CC1|OUTSTANDING WORK DONE BY VICE   
20101223112709.000|20101223112712.000|CC1|PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN, THE        
20101223112712.000|20101223112714.000|CC1|CHAIRMAN OF THE FOREIGN         
20101223112714.000|20101223112714.000|CC1|RELATIONS COMMITTEE, SENATOR    
20101223112714.000|20101223112717.000|CC1|JOHN KERRY, AND THE RANKING     
20101223112717.000|20101223112718.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN SENATOR RICHARD LUGAR
20101223112718.000|20101223112720.000|CC1|FOR THEIR EXTRAORDINARY EFFORTS.
20101223112720.000|20101223112722.000|CC1|I JUST GOT OFF THE PHONE WITH   
20101223112722.000|20101223112724.000|CC1|DICK LUGAR AND REMINDED HIM THAT
20101223112724.000|20101223112726.000|CC1|THE FIRST TRIP I EVER TOOK AS   
20101223112726.000|20101223112728.000|CC1|CENTER, THE FIRST FOREIGN TRIP  
20101223112728.000|20101223112730.000|CC1|WAS WITH DICK LUGAR TO RUSSIA TO
20101223112730.000|20101223112732.000|CC1|LOOK AT NUCLEAR FACILITIES      
20101223112732.000|20101223112734.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20101223112734.000|20101223112736.000|CC1|I TOLD HIM HOW MUCH I APPRECIATE
20101223112736.000|20101223112738.000|CC1|THE WORK HE HAD DONE AND THERE  
20101223112738.000|20101223112740.000|CC1|WAS A DIRECT LINE BETWEEN THAT  
20101223112740.000|20101223112742.000|CC1|TRIP WE TOOK TOGETHER WHEN I    
20101223112742.000|20101223112745.000|CC1|WAS A FIRST-YEAR SENATOR AND THE
20101223112745.000|20101223112746.000|CC1|RESULT OF THE VOTE TODAY ON THE 
20101223112746.000|20101223112749.000|CC1|FLOOR.                          
20101223112749.000|20101223112751.000|CC1|THIS ALLSTATE TO A TRADITION OF 
20101223112751.000|20101223112752.000|CC1|BIPARTISAN SUPPORT FOR STRONG   
20101223112752.000|20101223112754.000|CC1|AMERICAN LEADERSHIP AROUND THE  
20101223112754.000|20101223112755.000|CC1|WORLD WHICH IS A TRADITION THAT 
20101223112755.000|20101223112756.000|CC1|WAS REINFORCED BY THE FACT THAT 
20101223112756.000|20101223112758.000|CC1|THE NEW START TREATY WON THE    
20101223112758.000|20101223112800.000|CC1|BACKING OF OUR MILITARY AND OUR 
20101223112800.000|20101223112801.000|CC1|ALLIES ABROAD.                  
20101223112801.000|20101223112804.000|CC1|IN THE LAST FEW WEEKS, WE ALSO  
20101223112804.000|20101223112806.000|CC1|CAME TOGETHER ACROSS PARTY LINES
20101223112806.000|20101223112809.000|CC1|TO PASS A PACKAGE OF TAX CUTS IN
20101223112809.000|20101223112810.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT INSURANCE THAT WILL
20101223112810.000|20101223112813.000|CC1|SPUR JOBS, AND GROWTH.          
20101223112813.000|20101223112815.000|CC1|THIS PACKAGE INCLUDES A PAYROLL 
20101223112815.000|20101223112817.000|CC1|TAX CUT THAT MEANS NEARLY EVERY 
20101223112817.000|20101223112818.000|CC1|AMERICAN FAMILY WOULD GET AN    
20101223112818.000|20101223112820.000|CC1|AVERAGE TAX CUT NEXT YEAR OF    
20101223112820.000|20101223112822.000|CC1|ABOUT $1,000 DELIVERED IN THEIR 
20101223112822.000|20101223112822.000|CC1|PAYCHECKS.                      
20101223112822.000|20101223112824.000|CC1|IT WILL MAKE A DIFFERENCE FOR   
20101223112824.000|20101223112826.000|CC1|MILLIONS OF STUDENTS, PARENTS,  
20101223112826.000|20101223112828.000|CC1|AND WORKERS AND PEOPLE STILL    
20101223112828.000|20101223112829.000|CC1|LOOKING FOR WORK.               
20101223112829.000|20101223112831.000|CC1|IT HAS LED ECONOMISTS ACROSS THE
20101223112831.000|20101223112833.000|CC1|POLITICAL SPECTRUM TO PREDICT   
20101223112833.000|20101223112835.000|CC1|THE ECONOMY WILL GROW FASTER    
20101223112835.000|20101223112836.000|CC1|THAN THEY ORIGINALLY THOUGHT    
20101223112836.000|20101223112838.000|CC1|NEXT YEAR.                      
20101223112838.000|20101223112839.000|CC1|IN OUR ONGOING STRUGGLE TO      
20101223112839.000|20101223112841.000|CC1|PERFECT OUR UNION, WE ALSO      
20101223112841.000|20101223112844.000|CC1|OVERTURNED A 17-YEAR-OLD LAW AND
20101223112844.000|20101223112845.000|CC1|A LONG STANDING INJUSTICE BY    
20101223112845.000|20101223112853.000|CC1|FINALLY ENDING "DON'T ASK,      
20101223112853.000|20101223112854.000|CC1|DON'T TELL.                     
20101223112854.000|20101223112856.000|CC1|THIS IS THE RIGHT THING TO DO.  
20101223112856.000|20101223112900.000|CC1|WE CAN ACROSS PARTY LINES TO    
20101223112900.000|20101223112903.000|CC1|PASS A FOOD SAFETY BILL.        
20101223112903.000|20101223112905.000|CC1|I HOPE THE HOUSE WILL SOON JOIN 
20101223112905.000|20101223112908.000|CC1|THE SENATE IN PASSING A 9/11    
20101223112908.000|20101223112909.000|CC1|HEALTH BILL THAT WILL HELP COVER
20101223112909.000|20101223112912.000|CC1|THE HEALTH CARE COSTS OF POLICE 
20101223112912.000|20101223112913.000|CC1|OFFICERS, FIREFIGHTERS, RESCUE  
20101223112913.000|20101223112915.000|CC1|WORKERS, AND RESIDENTS WHO IN   
20101223112915.000|20101223112917.000|CC1|HELD TOXIC AIR NEAR THE WORLD   
20101223112917.000|20101223112918.000|CC1|TRADE CENTER ON THAT TERRIBLE   
20101223112918.000|20101223112921.000|CC1|MORNING AND THE DAYS THAT       
20101223112921.000|20101223112922.000|CC1|FOLLOWED.                       
20101223112922.000|20101223112924.000|CC1|I THINK IT IS FAIR TO SAY THAT  
20101223112924.000|20101223112925.000|CC1|THIS HAS BEEN THE MOST          
20101223112925.000|20101223112928.000|CC1|PRODUCTIVE POST-ELECTION PERIOD 
20101223112928.000|20101223112930.000|CC1|WE HAVE HAD IN DECADES AND IT   
20101223112930.000|20101223112932.000|CC1|COMES ON THE HEELS OF THE MOST  
20101223112932.000|20101223112934.000|CC1|PRODUCTIVE TWO YEARS WE HAVE HAD
20101223112934.000|20101223112934.000|CC1|IN GENERATIONS.                 
20101223112934.000|20101223112936.000|CC1|THAT DOES NOT MEAN THAT OUR     
20101223112936.000|20101223112939.000|CC1|BUSINESS IS FINISHED.           
20101223112939.000|20101223112940.000|CC1|I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED CONGRESS 
20101223112940.000|20101223112943.000|CC1|WAS NOT ABLE TO PASS THE DREAM  
20101223112943.000|20101223112945.000|CC1|ACT SO WE CAN STOP PUNISHING    
20101223112945.000|20101223112947.000|CC1|KIDS FOR THE ACTS OF THEIR      
20101223112947.000|20101223112949.000|CC1|PARENTS AND ALLOW THEM TO SERVE 
20101223112949.000|20101223112951.000|CC1|IN THE MILITARY AND CONTRARY TO 
20101223112951.000|20101223112952.000|CC1|THEIR TALENTS INTO THE COUNTRY  
20101223112952.000|20101223112953.000|CC1|THEY GREW UP IN.                
20101223112953.000|20101223112954.000|CC1|I AM DISAPPOINTED WE COULD NOT  
20101223112954.000|20101223112956.000|CC1|COME TOGETHER AROUND A BUDGET TO
20101223112956.000|20101223112958.000|CC1|FUND OUR GOVERNMENT OVER THE    
20101223112958.000|20101223112959.000|CC1|LONG TERM BUT I EXPECT WE'LL    
20101223112959.000|20101223113001.000|CC1|HAVE A ROBUST DEBATE ABOUT THIS 
20101223113001.000|20101223113002.000|CC1|WHEN WE RETURN FROM THE         
20101223113002.000|20101223113003.000|CC1|HOLIDAYS.                       
20101223113003.000|20101223113004.000|CC1|IT WILL A DEBATE THAT WILL HAVE 
20101223113004.000|20101223113006.000|CC1|TO ENTER AN INCREASINGLY URGENT 
20101223113006.000|20101223113008.000|CC1|QUESTION -- HOW WE CUT SPENDING 
20101223113008.000|20101223113010.000|CC1|THAT WE DON'T NEED WHILE STILL  
20101223113010.000|20101223113011.000|CC1|MAKING INVESTMENTS THAT WE DO   
20101223113011.000|20101223113013.000|CC1|NEED.                           
20101223113013.000|20101223113014.000|CC1|INVESTMENT IN EDUCATION,        
20101223113014.000|20101223113017.000|CC1|RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT,       
20101223113017.000|20101223113017.000|CC1|INNOVATION, AND THE THINGS THAT 
20101223113017.000|20101223113019.000|CC1|ARE ESSENTIAL TO GROW OUR       
20101223113019.000|20101223113021.000|CC1|ECONOMY OVER THE LONG RUN,      
20101223113021.000|20101223113023.000|CC1|CREATE JOBS, AND COMPETE WITH   
20101223113023.000|20101223113024.000|CC1|EVERY OTHER NATION AND THE      
20101223113024.000|20101223113025.000|CC1|WORLD.                          
20101223113025.000|20101223113027.000|CC1|I LOOK FORWARD TO HEARING FROM  
20101223113027.000|20101223113028.000|CC1|FOLKS ON BOTH SIDES OF THE AISLE
20101223113028.000|20101223113029.000|CC1|ABOUT HOW WE CAN ACCOMPLISH THAT
20101223113029.000|20101223113031.000|CC1|GOAL.                           
20101223113031.000|20101223113033.000|CC1|IF THERE IS ANY LESSON TO DRAW  
20101223113033.000|20101223113035.000|CC1|FROM THESE PAST FEW WEEKS, IT IS
20101223113035.000|20101223113038.000|CC1|THAT WE ARE NOT DOOMED TO       
20101223113038.000|20101223113038.000|CC1|ENDLESS GRIDLOCK.               
20101223113038.000|20101223113041.000|CC1|WE HAVE SHOWN IN THE WAKE OF THE
20101223113041.000|20101223113042.000|CC1|NOVEMBER ELECTIONS THAT WE HAVE 
20101223113042.000|20101223113044.000|CC1|THE CAPACITY NOT ONLY TO MAKE   
20101223113044.000|20101223113046.000|CC1|PROGRESS BUT TO MAKE PROGRESS   
20101223113046.000|20101223113047.000|CC1|TOGETHER.                       
20101223113047.000|20101223113048.000|CC1| I AM.                          
20101223113048.000|20101223113050.000|CC1|NAIVE.                          
20101223113050.000|20101223113052.000|CC1|I KNOW THERE WILL BE TOUGH      
20101223113052.000|20101223113055.000|CC1|FIGHTS AHEAD.                   
20101223113055.000|20101223113057.000|CC1|WE CAN CONTINUE TO HEED THE     
20101223113057.000|20101223113058.000|CC1|MESSAGE OF THE AMERICAN PEOPLE  
20101223113058.000|20101223113101.000|CC1|AND HOLD TO A SPIRIT OF COMMON  
20101223113101.000|20101223113103.000|CC1|PURPOSE IN 2011 AND BEYOND.     
20101223113103.000|20101223113106.000|CC1|IF WE DO THAT, I AM CONVINCED WE
20101223113106.000|20101223113108.000|CC1|WILL LIFT UP OUR MIDDLE-CLASS,  
20101223113108.000|20101223113110.000|CC1|REBUILD OUR ECONOMY, AND WE WILL
20101223113110.000|20101223113111.000|CC1|MAKE OUR CONTRIBUTION TO        
20101223113111.000|20101223113113.000|CC1|AMERICA'S GREATNESS.            
20101223113113.000|20101223113115.000|CC1|FINALLY, BEFORE I TAKE          
20101223113115.000|20101223113116.000|CC1|QUESTIONS, I WANT TO SEND A     
20101223113116.000|20101223113118.000|CC1|MESSAGE TO ALL THOSE AMERICANS  
20101223113118.000|20101223113120.000|CC1|WHO ARE SPENDING CHRISTMAS      
20101223113120.000|20101223113121.000|CC1|SERVING OUR NATION IN HARM'S
